story.title: #MuseumWeek 2016
story.description: #MuseumWeek is a social media event where museums from across the world showcase their collections. 2016âs #MuseumWeek took place between 28 March and 3 April, and focused on different themes each day. Hereâs a round-up of our tweets.

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.
